alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 29 at 9:06AM PST until January 29 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility less than 1/4 mile in dense fog. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Caruthers -San Joaquin -Selma. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 11 AM PST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late Monday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
